name: Rise & Shine (itch) (Dmitry Mozgin)
description:
Rise & Shine is a small game which takes mechanics from Memory and adds some narrative.

The game and all the content are created by me.

I hope you'll enjoy the game.

Please, if you have any feedback, I would be glad to hear it!

How To Play

Gameplay is meant to be intuitive. You should use a mouse, click on the cards and pick pairs. 

If you have problems in playing the game in a browser, consider to use a standalone application for Windows or MacOS.

If you play the game in a browser, consider to switch to the fullscreen mode.
